participant_1.background:
I love working out with music to help push myself.
I like to think about my childhood.
i work full time in an office , so i don t have much time to practice.
My family is my best support system.
I'm a bit tired from working part time, but my new sneakers are helping!

participant_2.background:
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
i wonder about what life in space would be like.
I got rejected from my dream job after putting all my heart and soul into the application process.
I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
my neighbor comes over all the time to watch rugby with me.

content.text: Pretty good. I got rejected from my dream job yesterday.
Oh no! That's so tough. I'm sorry to hear that.
Thanks, me too. But I'm trying to stay positive and looking forward to the future.
That's great. I'm sure you'll find something even better.
I hope so! I'm thinking about starting my own wedding planning business.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'd be really good at it.
Thanks! I think so too. I love weddings and I'm really good at planning things.
That's awesome. I hope your business takes off!
What else is going on with you?
Not much. I just went to the bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
Oh that's nice. What kind of cookies?
Yum! I love chocolate chip cookies.
Well it sounds like you're having a pretty good day overall.
Yeah, I am. Thanks for listening.
No problem. I'm always here to talk.
